Grounding Attack.name: Grounding Attack
Grounding Attack.fullText:
Wyrm-Hunter Attack 11Grounding Attack

Taking careful aim, you deliver a swift blow to the dragon’s wing, sending the great beast crashing down.

Encounter        Martial
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier (ranged). You can also deal +1[W], or the target cannot fly until the end of your next turn. If the target is flying when it loses the ability to fly, it falls.


Published in Dragon Magazine 369, page(s) 50.
Grounding Attack.flavor: Taking careful aim, you deliver a swift blow to the dragon’s wing,  sending the great beast crashing down.
Grounding Attack.range:
Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier (ranged). You can also deal +1[W], or the target cannot fly until the end of your next turn. If the target is flying when it loses the ability to fly, it falls.
Grounding Attack.attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Grounding Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier (ranged). You can also deal +1[W], or the target cannot fly until the end of your next turn. If the target is flying when it loses the ability to fly, it falls.

Into the Fire.name: Into the Fire
Into the Fire.fullText:
Wyrm-Hunter Utility 12Into the Fire

Even as the flames crackle around you, burning your flesh, you take advantage of the distraction they provide to move in on your foe.

Encounter  
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: An enemy targets you with a close or area attack.

Effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your speed.


Published in Dragon Magazine 369, page(s) 50.
Into the Fire.flavor: Even as the flames crackle around you, burning your flesh, you take advantage of the distraction they provide to move in on your foe.

Deadly Aim.name: Deadly Aim
Deadly Aim.fullText:
Wyrm-Hunter Attack 20Deadly Aim

The dragon shrieks in pain, unaware that this was merely a ranging shot for a far deadlier attack to come.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier (ranged). In addition, your next attack that hits the target, if it occurs before the end of your next turn, deals +3[W] damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 369, page(s) 50.
Deadly Aim.flavor: The dragon shrieks in pain, unaware that this was merely a ranging shot for a far deadlier attack to come.
